**The Supreme Mysterious Numinous Northern Dipper Original Destiny Longevity True Scripture**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Mysterious Numinous Northern Dipper Original Destiny Longevity True Scripture*. The author is unknown, approximately dating to the early Northern Song dynasty. It falsely attributes its transmission to the Supreme Lord Lao, who in Shu Prefecture bestowed it upon the Celestial Master Zhang Daoling of the Han, expounding upon the rituals of offering to the Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords for the remission of sins and the invocation of blessings. One scroll.

**Source of Base Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Section of Divine Writings*, *Category of Original Texts*.

---

**The Supreme Mysterious Numinous Northern Dipper Original Destiny Longevity True Scripture**

At that time, the Supreme Lord Lao, on the seventh day of the first month in the first year of *Yongshou*, was upon the Terrace of Grand Clarity within the Palace of the Supreme Ultimate. Gazing upon sentient beings adrift for kalpas, endlessly revolving through birth and death—some dwelling in the human realm, born within the Central Kingdom, others among the barbarian tribes of the east or the wild tribes of the west; some wealthy, some noble, some base, some poor—all transient in their karmic conditions, they fell into hell, bound by their indeterminate fate. Their sins and karma entangled them, their souls shackled to the nether courts, suffering until their term was fulfilled. Departing the human way, they were reborn among beasts or as birds and insects, estranged from humanity, scarcely able to regain a human form. Thus they sank, unaware, for in past lives they had strayed from the true Dao, enduring this cycle of rebirth.

Moved by compassion, the Lord divided his form to teach and transform, descending in manifestation to the capital of Shu. The earth spirits surged forth, raising a jade platform to serve as a lofty seat.

Thereupon, the Lord ascended the jade platform and bestowed upon the Celestial Master the esoteric instructions of the *Northern Dipper Original Destiny Scripture*, broadly proclaiming its essential methods to universally deliver sentient beings.

At that moment, the Lord addressed the Celestial Master, saying: "The human body is difficult to obtain; birth in the Central Kingdom is rare. Even if one attains it, encountering the true Dharma is hard. Many stray from the true Dao, entering heterodox sects; many plant the roots of sin; many indulge in cunning and deceit; many give rein to lust and killing; many delight in crowds and passions; many yield to greed and wrath; many sink into hell; many lose their human form. For such reasons, sentient beings remain deluded, unaware of the true Dao, and the confused are many.

I now, grieving at the sight of these beings, descend this Dharma teaching to expound the good causes, that they may know the Dao, understand that body and life essence all arise from the Dao. Comprehending this principle, they may abide long in the human way, their lineage unbroken, generation after generation as humans, never born in lands devoid of the Dao, never severed from the root of humanity. Further, if they cultivate the true Dao in their hearts, they may gradually enter the lineage of immortals, forever escaping the cycle of rebirth, transcending to attain the Dao. Thus I reveal to you this wondrous method, that you may deliver the people of heaven to return to the truth and know their destiny.

On the day of one’s original destiny, one may perform purification rites and establish an altar, invoking the Northern Dipper, the Three Officials, the Five Emperors, the Nine Bureaus, and the Four Administrations, offering prayers for blessings and the dissolution of calamities. Submit memorials with earnest vows, reverently presenting offerings—various incense and flowers, seasonal fruits, and the proper ritual observances. Establish a pure altar, modeling heaven and earth, whether in a temple or at home, contributing according to one’s means. Conduct the ritual, for the merit is profound and cannot be fully described. Recite the names of the Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords, and one’s sins shall be eradicated, misfortunes washed away, blessings and longevity bestowed upon one’s life, and good fruits gathered to one’s person. In times of urgent peril, one may burn incense and recite the scripture to secure peace within the appointed time."

Thereupon, the efficacy of the Great Sage Northern Dipper in resolving calamities is proclaimed:

The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the three disasters,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the four deadly perils,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the five-phase calamities,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the six harms,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the seven injuries,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the eight difficulties,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the nine-star calamities,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of husband and wife,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of men and women,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of childbirth,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of repeated misfortune,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of epidemics,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of illness,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of malevolent spirits,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of tigers and wolves,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of insects and snakes,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of bandits and robbers,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of cangues and cudgels,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of unnatural death,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of curses and oaths,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of heavenly nets,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of earthly snares,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of blades and warfare,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of water and fire.

Thereupon, the Seven Primordial Lords, the Great Sages, are numinously efficacious.
They deliver from all calamities and hardships, lifting sentient beings from suffering.
If one makes urgent supplication, recitation ensures peace and tranquility.
All depends on the generation of a hundred blessings, all harmonizing with the five phases.
The three *hun* souls are secure and healthy; malevolent spirits cannot linger.
True *qi* descends from the five directions; myriad blessings naturally converge.
Longevity transcends the eight difficulties, all through reverence for the seven stars.
Life after life, the body is at ease; generation after generation, the spirit remains pure.
Goodness is like a reflection in light; response is like an echo in a valley.
The Three Primordials and the spirits together protect; the myriad sages share the same luminous gaze.
No disasters, no obstructions—forever preserving the tranquility of the Daoist heart.

The Lord Lao said: "The Northern Asterism hangs as a celestial image, and the myriad stars pay it homage. It is the pivot of creation, the master of human spirits, proclaiming its might across the three realms, governing the ten thousand numina. It judges the span of good and evil in the human world, oversees the right and wrong of the nether courts. The five phases share its mandate; the seven luminaries follow its course. It possesses the power to reverse death and inscribe life, to dissolve calamities and deliver from hardship. From emperors above to commoners below, though their stations differ, their destinies are without distinction."

The common folk in the world are often lost and deluded, unaware that their bodies belong to the Northern Dipper and their lives are governed by the Celestial Treasury. When disasters and misfortunes strike, they know not the gate of absolution; when they pray for blessings and longevity, they remain ignorant of the path to return to truth. Thus, their souls are assailed, and calamities cling to them. Some suffer from chronic illness, others are afflicted by malevolent spirits, languishing for years in distress, entangled in misfortune for ages. Lawsuits and summonses arise, ancestral spirits are implicated, or heavenly reprimands descend, or vengeful ghosts lodge false accusations. When such perils arise, how may one seek deliverance? One must urgently petition the Northern Dipper, offer rites of gratitude to the Perfected Lords, and recite the true scriptures, recognizing the Perfected Lord of one’s own destiny—only then may one attain peace and prosperity, even flourishing in health and honor. There are yet deeper mysteries that cannot be fully expounded.

Whenever one beholds the true form of the Northern Dipper, one must bow in reverence and pay homage. The first star, Yang Brightness, the Greedy Wolf Great Star Lord, governs those born in the year of the Rat. The second star, Yin Essence, the Great Gate Primordial Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Ox and Pig. The third star, Perfected Human, the Emolument-Store True Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Tiger and Dog. The fourth star, Mysterious Darkness, the Literary Curved Binding Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Rabbit and Rooster. The fifth star, Cinnabar Prime, the Upright Integrity Network Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Dragon and Monkey. The sixth star, Northern Culmen, the Martial Curved Chronicle Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Snake and Sheep. The seventh star, Celestial Pass, the Broken Army Pass Star Lord, governs those born in the year of the Horse. The eighth star is the Cavern Brightness Outer Auxiliary Star Lord, and the ninth is the Hidden Light Inner Assistant Star Lord. The Upper Terrace is the Void Essence Opening Virtue Star Lord, the Middle Terrace is the Sixfold Purity Controller of Emptiness Star Lord, and the Lower Terrace is the Curved Life Controller of Emolument Star Lord. These are the names and titles of the Perfected Lords, which one may rarely hear. Yet whoever hears and upholds them is one of profound Daoist devotion, blessed with good karmic affinity from past lives. To hear and recite them brings merit and power beyond measure.

If devout men and women of true faith encounter this true scripture, their wisdom-nature will become complete, their Daoist heart will unfold, they will emerge from the paths of delusion, enter the Gate of the Subtle and Inaudible, return to the true lineage, and attain the realm of flourishing life. On the days of the Three Primes, the Eight Festivals, one’s destiny-day, birthday, or the day beneath the Northern Dipper, one should meticulously prepare an altar, recite the scriptures, hold fasts and offer rites, and perform the Daoist liturgy according to the proper forms. The blessings thus accrued will be boundless, spanning lives across generations, never straying from true nature, never falling into heterodox views. Those who uphold this scripture should constantly recite the honored names of the Seven Perfected Lords of the Northern Dipper. When their virtuous merit is complete, auspicious signs will descend.

The Northern Dipper Incantation is as follows:
Northern Dipper of Nine Stars, great deities of the central heavens,
Above they ascend to the Golden Gates, below they cover Kunlun.
They regulate the cosmic order, govern the cosmos and earth.
Great Dipper and Greedy Wolf, Great Gate and Emolument-Store,
Literary Curved and Upright Integrity, Martial Curved and Broken Army.
Supreme Jade Emperor, Purple Tenuity Emperor Lord,
Encompassing the great celestial realm, penetrating even the tiniest dust.
What disaster cannot be eradicated? What blessing cannot be attained?
Prime imperial qi, come and merge with my body.
Wherever the Celestial Pivot points, it turns day and night without cease.
The common folk, though humble, seek the Dao and yearn for numinous power.
May they behold your honored form and forever preserve long life.
The Three Terraces of Void Essence, the Sixfold Purity of Curved Life,
They give me life, nurture me, and protect my form.
[...] honored Emperor of the Dipper, swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!

Lord Lao said: "The five constituents of human nature and life all fall under the governance of the Star Official of one’s destiny. The spirit-generals of one’s destiny and the stellar officials of one’s natal constellation constantly bestow their protection, sustaining one’s life and preserving one’s allotted years. Yet the common folk, ignorant and unenlightened, remain unaware throughout their lives. The Perfected Official of one’s destiny descends to the human realm six times each year, and the day of descent is one’s destiny-day. During the limit-period, thirty thousand Southern Mound Envoys and seventy thousand spirit-generals of the Northern Dipper accompany the Perfected Official of one’s destiny in their descent, with all the Perfected Ones gathering to offer protection. This is the time to dissolve disasters, repent of sins, pray for blessings, and extend life. According to one’s means, one may perform rites and fasts, thereby augmenting one’s fortune and virtue.

If the limit-period of one’s destiny is approaching and one remains unaware, failing to prepare fasts and rites or maintain incense offerings, this is to treat life with contempt, to be deluded about one’s origin, and to disregard the value of human existence. The celestial authorities will revoke one’s emoluments, reduce one’s allotted years, and curtail one’s lifespan, often leading to premature death. Those who err in this way, even if they encounter the scriptural instructions, harbor disbelief, slander the true text, and thus, after their bodies perish, they will sink into the Three Wretched Realms, drift through the various destinies, and forever lose human form. How tragic and pitiable it is that they bring such suffering upon themselves!

If, on one’s destiny-day, one can perform fasts and rites, and sincerely communicate with the celestial authorities, reciting the true scriptures during the limit-period of one’s destiny, and broadly presenting offerings, then for three lifetimes one will always be reborn as a man, wealthy, noble, intelligent, and preeminent among humanity. Even if one’s karmic endowment in this life is meager, leaving one poor and lowly while still in human form, if one knows one’s destiny-day but lacks the means to perform grand rites, one may still offer a cup of water or a flower, focus one’s mind, bow toward the Northern Culmen, and recite the name of the Perfected Lord of one’s destiny. In this way, one will not pass through the limit-period of one’s destiny in vain, but will extend life and inscribe blessings, always retaining human form, dispelling calamities, and accruing boundless fortune.

The Heavenly Master rejoiced, leapt, and bowed in reverence, praising the encounter with this unsurpassed Dharma bridge as something rarely attainable. Lord Lao further addressed the Heavenly Master, saying: "The sins, blessings, good, and evil of the world’s people all fall under the jurisdiction of the celestial authorities. To repent of sins and dissolve disasters, nothing surpasses devout practice. On one’s destiny-day, birthday, the day of the Middle Prime, the Horse Day of Departure, the Day of Exfoliation, or during the Three Disasters and Nine Calamities, one should ensure the peace and well-being of one’s present family.

If superior practitioners uphold this true text on their destiny-days, they will externally subdue demonic forces and internally stabilize their true nature. Their merit will extend to the water and land realms, benefiting both the living and the dead. Through repentance and reverence, they will gradually ascend to the wondrous fruit, reestablish profound merit, and realize the Dao of Emptiness and Non-being. Thus, they will attain the perfection of sagely wisdom, their presence and absence unfathomable, moving freely between existence and non-existence, roaming the cloudy skies, ascending through the Golden Gate, and uniting with the Perfected. Their bodies will transcend the Three Realms, never again to be subject to the wheel of rebirth, their lifespan boundless, and their joy and freedom unending."

When men and women, on their destiny-days or during various fasts, purify body and mind, burn incense, and uphold this true text, they may recognize the Star Lord to whom their destiny is bound at the Northern Pole. With sincere prayer, no good shall go unanswered; calamities and transgressions shall be dissolved, drawing the response of ten thousand sages and a thousand Perfected Ones, all coming to guard and protect. Wherever this text resides, a thousand Perfected Ones pay reverence, and ten thousand sages offer protection. Demons and ghosts withdraw in silence, spirits and numina conceal themselves. All worldly misfortunes and disasters shall be utterly eradicated.

This is called *The Northern Dipper’s Destiny-Prolonging Scripture and Formula*—the very path of cultivating the true, the means to attain the Dao and roam freely. Through this scripture, one certifies sagehood and achieves Perfection; through this scripture, one transcends birth and death; through this scripture, men and women are safeguarded; through this scripture, life is preserved and years extended, granting boundless freedom. It shall forever be a treasure of the body, bestowing blessings and longevity. Guard it with reverence; do not reveal it to the unworthy.

As the Venerable Lord concluded the scripture, dragons, cranes, and celestial immortals came to welcome him, escorting him back to Jade Capital. At that moment, the Heavenly Master, having received this wondrous Dharma, declared: "I vow to propagate it widely, transmitting it to the virtuous. If men or women receive, uphold, and recite it, I, along with the Ten Precept Celestial Officials, shall protect them wherever they may be." Thereupon, he bowed to the Venerable Lord and offered this eulogy:

Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
One’s destiny invokes true numen.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The household attains peace and tranquility.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Parents are preserved in long life.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All malevolent forces turn to dust.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Myriad evils naturally return to rectitude.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All undertakings prosper as desired.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The entire family enjoys health and well-being.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Descendants are safeguarded in glory and flourishing.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The five paths open of their own accord.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All misfortunes are forever extinguished.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Livestock thrives and multiplies.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Illnesses find healing and recovery.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Wealth and possessions are not squandered in vain.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Unforeseen troubles never arise.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
One eternally preserves harmony, benefit, and integrity.

The Venerable Lord said: "Excellent! Excellent!"

"You may propagate the true teaching,
Its boundless blessings and benefits
Shall universally reach all beings,
Eternally bestowing supreme goodness."

The Heavenly Master bowed his head in reverence and gratitude,
Faithfully receiving and upholding the teaching.

Thus concludes the *Most High Mysterious Numinous Northern Dipper Original Destiny Life-Prolonging True Scripture*.

chunks.original_text: 太上玄灵北斗本命延生真经 经名：太上玄灵北斗本命延生真经。 撰人不详，约出许北宋初。 假托太上老君在蜀郡傅授汉天师张陵，言醮祖北斗七元君除罪祈福之事。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞神部本文类。 太上玄灵北斗本命延生真经 尔时，太上老君，以永寿元年正月七日，在泰清境上太极宫中，观见众生亿劫漂沉，周回生死，或居人道，生在中华，或生夷狄之中，或生蛮戎之内，或富或贵，或贱或贫，暂假因缘，堕於地狱，为无定故，罪业牵缠，魂系阴司，受苦满足，人道将违，生居畜兽之中，或生禽虫之属，转乖人道，难复人身，如此沉沦，不自知觉，为先世迷真之故，受此轮回。 乃以哀悯之心，分身教化，化身下降，至於蜀都，地神涌出扶一玉局，而作高座。 於是老君升玉局坐，授与天师北斗本命经诀，广宣要法，普济众生。 是时，老君告天师曰：人身难得，中土难生，假使得生，正法难遇，多迷真道，多入邢宗，多种罪根，多肆巧诈，多恣淫杀，多好群情，多纵贪嗔，多沉地狱，多失人身，如此等缘，众生不悟，不知正道，迷惑者多。 我今哀见此等众生，故垂法教，为说良缘，令使知道，知身性命，皆凭道生，了悟此因，长生人道，种子不绝，世世为人，不生无道之乡，不断人之根本，更能心修正道，渐入仙宗，永离轮回，超升成道，我故示汝妙法，令度天民归真知命。 可以本命之日，修斋设醮，启祝北斗三官五帝九府四司，荐福消灾，奏章恳愿，虔诚献礼，种种香华，时新五果，随世威仪，清净坛宇，法天像地，或於观宇，或在家庭，随力建功，请行法事，功德深重，不可具陈，念此大圣北斗七元真君名号，当得罪业消除，灾衰洗荡，福寿资命，善果臻身，凡有急难，可以焚香诵经，克期安泰。 於是说大圣北斗解厄应验曰： 大圣北斗七元君能解三灾厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解四杀厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解五行厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解六害厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解七伤厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解八难厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解九星厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解夫妻厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解男女厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解产生厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解复连厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解疫疠厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解疾病厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解精邪厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解虎狼厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解虫蛇厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解劫贼厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解枷棒厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解横死厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解咒誓厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解天罗厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解地网厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解刀兵厄， 大圣北斗七元君能解水火厄。 於是七元君，大圣善通灵。 济度诸厄难，超出苦众生。 若有急告者，持诵保安宁。 尽凭生百福，咸契於五行。 三魂得安健，邪魅不能停。 五方降真炁，万福自来并。 长生超八难，皆由奉七星。 生生身自在，世世保神清。 善似光中影，应如谷里声。 三元神共护，万圣眼同明。 无灾亦无障，永保道心宁。 老君曰：北辰垂象，而众星拱之，为造化之枢机，作人神之主宰，宣威三界，统御万灵，判人间善恶之期，司阴府是非之目，五行共禀，七政同科，有回死注生之功，有消灾度厄之力，上至帝王，下及庶人，尊卑虽则殊途，命分俱无差别。

The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the four deadly perils,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the five-phase calamities,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the six harms,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the seven injuries,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the eight difficulties,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the nine-star calamities,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of husband and wife,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of men and women,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of childbirth,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of repeated misfortune,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of epidemics,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of illness,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of malevolent spirits,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of tigers and wolves,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of insects and snakes,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of bandits and robbers,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of cangues and cudgels,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of unnatural death,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of curses and oaths,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of heavenly nets,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of earthly snares,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of blades and warfare,
The Great Sage Northern Dipper’s Seven Primordial Lords can resolve the calamities of water and fire.

Thereupon, the Seven Primordial Lords, the Great Sages, are numinously efficacious.
They deliver from all calamities and hardships, lifting sentient beings from suffering.
If one makes urgent supplication, recitation ensures peace and tranquility.
All depends on the generation of a hundred blessings, all harmonizing with the five phases.
The three *hun* souls are secure and healthy; malevolent spirits cannot linger.
True *qi* descends from the five directions; myriad blessings naturally converge.
Longevity transcends the eight difficulties, all through reverence for the seven stars.
Life after life, the body is at ease; generation after generation, the spirit remains pure.
Goodness is like a reflection in light; response is like an echo in a valley.
The Three Primordials and the spirits together protect; the myriad sages share the same luminous gaze.
No disasters, no obstructions—forever preserving the tranquility of the Daoist heart.

The Lord Lao said: "The Northern Asterism hangs as a celestial image, and the myriad stars pay it homage. It is the pivot of creation, the master of human spirits, proclaiming its might across the three realms, governing the ten thousand numina. It judges the span of good and evil in the human world, oversees the right and wrong of the nether courts. The five phases share its mandate; the seven luminaries follow its course. It possesses the power to reverse death and inscribe life, to dissolve calamities and deliver from hardship. From emperors above to commoners below, though their stations differ, their destinies are without distinction."

chunks.original_text: 凡夫在世迷谬者多，不知身属北斗，命由天府，有灾有患，不知解谢之门，祈福祈生，莫晓归真之路。 致使魂神被击，祸患来缠。 或重病不痊，或邪妖克害，连年困笃，累岁迍邅，冢讼征呼，先亡复连，或上天谴责，或下鬼诉诬。 若有此危厄，如何救解？ 急须投告北斗，醮谢真君，及转真经，认本命真君，方获安泰，以至康荣。 更有深妙，不可尽述。 凡见北斗真形，顶礼恭敬。 北斗第一阳明贪狼太星君子生人属之， 北斗第二阴精巨门元星君丑亥生人属之， 北斗第三真人禄存真星君寅戌生人属之， 北斗第四玄冥文曲纽星君卯酉生人属之， 北斗第五丹元廉贞纲星君辰申生人属之， 北斗第六北极武曲纪星君巳未生人属之， 北斗第七天关破军关星君午生人属之， 北斗第八洞明外辅星君， 北斗第九隐光内弼星君， 上台虚精开德星君， 中台六淳司空星君， 下台曲生司禄星君。 如是真君名号，不可得闻。 凡有见闻能持念者，皆道心深重，宿有善缘，得闻持诵，其功德力莫可称量。 若正信男女，值此真经，智慧性圆，道心开发，出群迷径，入希夷门，归奉真宗，达生荣界，於三元、八节、本命、生辰、北斗下日，严置坛场，转经斋醮，依仪行道，其福无边，世世生生，不违真性，不入邪见，持经之人，常持誧七元真君所属尊号，善功圆满，亦降吉祥。 即说北斗咒曰：北斗九辰，中天大神。 上朝金阙，下覆昆仑。 调理纲纪，统制乾坤。 大魁贪狼，巨门禄存。 文曲廉贞，武曲破军。 高上玉皇，紫微帝君。 大周天界，细入微尘。 何灾不灭，何福不臻。 元皇正炁，来合我身。 天罡所指，昼夜常轮。 俗居小人，好道求灵。 愿见尊仪，永保长生。 三台虚精，六淳曲生。 生我养我，护我身形。 □□□□□□魁尊帝，急急如律令！ 老君曰：凡人性命五体，悉属本命星官之所主掌，本命神将、本宿星官常垂荫佑，主持人命，使保天年。 凡俗无知，终身不悟。 夫本命真官，每岁六度降在人间，降日为本命，限期有南陵使者三千人，北斗真君七千神将，本命真官降驾，众真悉来拥护，可以消灾忏罪，请福延生，随力章醮，福德增崇。 其有本命限期将至，自身不知，不设斋醮，不修香火，此为轻生迷本，不贵人身，天司夺禄，减算除年，多致夭丧。 迷误之者，虽遇经诀，怀不信心，毁谤真文，如此之人，身谢之后，沦役三途，漂沉诸趣，永失人身，深可悲哀，自致斯苦。 若本命之日能修斋醮，善达天司，一时於本命限期，开转真经，广陈供养，使三生常为男子身，富贵聪明，人中殊胜，其有生身果薄，虽在人中，贫穷下贱，纵知本命，无力修崇，能酌水献花，冥心望北极稽首礼拜，念本命真君名号者，亦不虚过本命限期，皆得延生注福，系系人身，灾厄蠲除，获福无量。 天师欢喜，踊跃作礼，赞叹难可得遇无上法桥。 老君重告天师曰：世人罪福善恶，皆属天司，忏罪消灾，莫越修奉，遇本命生辰，告身中元辰，驿马削落三灾九厄，保见今眷属安宁。 凡有上士於本命生辰持此真文者，外伏魔精，内安真性，功沾水陆，善及存亡，悔过虔恭，渐登妙果，重立玄功，证虚无道，乃得圣智圆通，隐显莫测，出有入无，逍遥云际，升入金门，与圣合真，身超三界，水不轮转，寿量无穷，快乐自在。
chunks.translated_text:
The common folk in the world are often lost and deluded, unaware that their bodies belong to the Northern Dipper and their lives are governed by the Celestial Treasury. When disasters and misfortunes strike, they know not the gate of absolution; when they pray for blessings and longevity, they remain ignorant of the path to return to truth. Thus, their souls are assailed, and calamities cling to them. Some suffer from chronic illness, others are afflicted by malevolent spirits, languishing for years in distress, entangled in misfortune for ages. Lawsuits and summonses arise, ancestral spirits are implicated, or heavenly reprimands descend, or vengeful ghosts lodge false accusations. When such perils arise, how may one seek deliverance? One must urgently petition the Northern Dipper, offer rites of gratitude to the Perfected Lords, and recite the true scriptures, recognizing the Perfected Lord of one’s own destiny—only then may one attain peace and prosperity, even flourishing in health and honor. There are yet deeper mysteries that cannot be fully expounded.

Whenever one beholds the true form of the Northern Dipper, one must bow in reverence and pay homage. The first star, Yang Brightness, the Greedy Wolf Great Star Lord, governs those born in the year of the Rat. The second star, Yin Essence, the Great Gate Primordial Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Ox and Pig. The third star, Perfected Human, the Emolument-Store True Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Tiger and Dog. The fourth star, Mysterious Darkness, the Literary Curved Binding Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Rabbit and Rooster. The fifth star, Cinnabar Prime, the Upright Integrity Network Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Dragon and Monkey. The sixth star, Northern Culmen, the Martial Curved Chronicle Star Lord, governs those born in the years of the Snake and Sheep. The seventh star, Celestial Pass, the Broken Army Pass Star Lord, governs those born in the year of the Horse. The eighth star is the Cavern Brightness Outer Auxiliary Star Lord, and the ninth is the Hidden Light Inner Assistant Star Lord. The Upper Terrace is the Void Essence Opening Virtue Star Lord, the Middle Terrace is the Sixfold Purity Controller of Emptiness Star Lord, and the Lower Terrace is the Curved Life Controller of Emolument Star Lord. These are the names and titles of the Perfected Lords, which one may rarely hear. Yet whoever hears and upholds them is one of profound Daoist devotion, blessed with good karmic affinity from past lives. To hear and recite them brings merit and power beyond measure.

If devout men and women of true faith encounter this true scripture, their wisdom-nature will become complete, their Daoist heart will unfold, they will emerge from the paths of delusion, enter the Gate of the Subtle and Inaudible, return to the true lineage, and attain the realm of flourishing life. On the days of the Three Primes, the Eight Festivals, one’s destiny-day, birthday, or the day beneath the Northern Dipper, one should meticulously prepare an altar, recite the scriptures, hold fasts and offer rites, and perform the Daoist liturgy according to the proper forms. The blessings thus accrued will be boundless, spanning lives across generations, never straying from true nature, never falling into heterodox views. Those who uphold this scripture should constantly recite the honored names of the Seven Perfected Lords of the Northern Dipper. When their virtuous merit is complete, auspicious signs will descend.

The Northern Dipper Incantation is as follows:
Northern Dipper of Nine Stars, great deities of the central heavens,
Above they ascend to the Golden Gates, below they cover Kunlun.
They regulate the cosmic order, govern the cosmos and earth.
Great Dipper and Greedy Wolf, Great Gate and Emolument-Store,
Literary Curved and Upright Integrity, Martial Curved and Broken Army.
Supreme Jade Emperor, Purple Tenuity Emperor Lord,
Encompassing the great celestial realm, penetrating even the tiniest dust.
What disaster cannot be eradicated? What blessing cannot be attained?
Prime imperial qi, come and merge with my body.
Wherever the Celestial Pivot points, it turns day and night without cease.
The common folk, though humble, seek the Dao and yearn for numinous power.
May they behold your honored form and forever preserve long life.
The Three Terraces of Void Essence, the Sixfold Purity of Curved Life,
They give me life, nurture me, and protect my form.
[...] honored Emperor of the Dipper, swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!

Lord Lao said: "The five constituents of human nature and life all fall under the governance of the Star Official of one’s destiny. The spirit-generals of one’s destiny and the stellar officials of one’s natal constellation constantly bestow their protection, sustaining one’s life and preserving one’s allotted years. Yet the common folk, ignorant and unenlightened, remain unaware throughout their lives. The Perfected Official of one’s destiny descends to the human realm six times each year, and the day of descent is one’s destiny-day. During the limit-period, thirty thousand Southern Mound Envoys and seventy thousand spirit-generals of the Northern Dipper accompany the Perfected Official of one’s destiny in their descent, with all the Perfected Ones gathering to offer protection. This is the time to dissolve disasters, repent of sins, pray for blessings, and extend life. According to one’s means, one may perform rites and fasts, thereby augmenting one’s fortune and virtue.

If the limit-period of one’s destiny is approaching and one remains unaware, failing to prepare fasts and rites or maintain incense offerings, this is to treat life with contempt, to be deluded about one’s origin, and to disregard the value of human existence. The celestial authorities will revoke one’s emoluments, reduce one’s allotted years, and curtail one’s lifespan, often leading to premature death. Those who err in this way, even if they encounter the scriptural instructions, harbor disbelief, slander the true text, and thus, after their bodies perish, they will sink into the Three Wretched Realms, drift through the various destinies, and forever lose human form. How tragic and pitiable it is that they bring such suffering upon themselves!

If, on one’s destiny-day, one can perform fasts and rites, and sincerely communicate with the celestial authorities, reciting the true scriptures during the limit-period of one’s destiny, and broadly presenting offerings, then for three lifetimes one will always be reborn as a man, wealthy, noble, intelligent, and preeminent among humanity. Even if one’s karmic endowment in this life is meager, leaving one poor and lowly while still in human form, if one knows one’s destiny-day but lacks the means to perform grand rites, one may still offer a cup of water or a flower, focus one’s mind, bow toward the Northern Culmen, and recite the name of the Perfected Lord of one’s destiny. In this way, one will not pass through the limit-period of one’s destiny in vain, but will extend life and inscribe blessings, always retaining human form, dispelling calamities, and accruing boundless fortune.

The Heavenly Master rejoiced, leapt, and bowed in reverence, praising the encounter with this unsurpassed Dharma bridge as something rarely attainable. Lord Lao further addressed the Heavenly Master, saying: "The sins, blessings, good, and evil of the world’s people all fall under the jurisdiction of the celestial authorities. To repent of sins and dissolve disasters, nothing surpasses devout practice. On one’s destiny-day, birthday, the day of the Middle Prime, the Horse Day of Departure, the Day of Exfoliation, or during the Three Disasters and Nine Calamities, one should ensure the peace and well-being of one’s present family.

If superior practitioners uphold this true text on their destiny-days, they will externally subdue demonic forces and internally stabilize their true nature. Their merit will extend to the water and land realms, benefiting both the living and the dead. Through repentance and reverence, they will gradually ascend to the wondrous fruit, reestablish profound merit, and realize the Dao of Emptiness and Non-being. Thus, they will attain the perfection of sagely wisdom, their presence and absence unfathomable, moving freely between existence and non-existence, roaming the cloudy skies, ascending through the Golden Gate, and uniting with the Perfected. Their bodies will transcend the Three Realms, never again to be subject to the wheel of rebirth, their lifespan boundless, and their joy and freedom unending."

chunks.original_text: 凡有男女於本命生辰及诸斋日，清净身心，焚香持此真文，自认北极本命所属星君，随心祷祝，善无不应，灾罪消除，致感万圣千真，俱来卫护。 此文所在之处，千真敬礼，万圣护持，魔鬼潜消，精灵伏匿，世有灾殃，悉皆消灭。 是名《北斗本命延生经诀》，乃修真之径路，得道逍遥，皆因此经，证圣成真，皆因此经，出离生死，皆因此经，保护男女，皆因此经，保命延年，皆得自在，永为身宝，福寿可称，保而敬之，非人勿示。 老君说经将毕，龙鹤天仙来迎，还於玉京。 是时天师受得妙法，而作是言，誓愿流行，以传善士，若有男女受持读诵，我当与十戒仙官所在拥护，於是再拜老君，而说赞曰： 家有《北斗经》，本命降真灵。 家有《北斗经》，宅舍得安宁。 家有《北斗经》，父母保长生。 家有《北斗经》，诸厌化为尘。 家有《北斗经》，万邪自归正。 家有《北斗经》，营业得称情。 家有《北斗经》，阖门自康健。 家有《北斗经》，子孙保荣盛。 家有《北斗经》，五路自通达。 家有《北斗经》，众恶永消灭。 家有《北斗经》，六畜保兴生。 家有《北斗经》，疾病得痊瘥。 家有《北斗经》，财物不虚耗。 家有《北斗经》，横事永不起。 家有《北斗经》，长保亨利贞。 老君曰：善哉！ 善哉！
chunks.translated_text:
When men and women, on their destiny-days or during various fasts, purify body and mind, burn incense, and uphold this true text, they may recognize the Star Lord to whom their destiny is bound at the Northern Pole. With sincere prayer, no good shall go unanswered; calamities and transgressions shall be dissolved, drawing the response of ten thousand sages and a thousand Perfected Ones, all coming to guard and protect. Wherever this text resides, a thousand Perfected Ones pay reverence, and ten thousand sages offer protection. Demons and ghosts withdraw in silence, spirits and numina conceal themselves. All worldly misfortunes and disasters shall be utterly eradicated.

This is called *The Northern Dipper’s Destiny-Prolonging Scripture and Formula*—the very path of cultivating the true, the means to attain the Dao and roam freely. Through this scripture, one certifies sagehood and achieves Perfection; through this scripture, one transcends birth and death; through this scripture, men and women are safeguarded; through this scripture, life is preserved and years extended, granting boundless freedom. It shall forever be a treasure of the body, bestowing blessings and longevity. Guard it with reverence; do not reveal it to the unworthy.

As the Venerable Lord concluded the scripture, dragons, cranes, and celestial immortals came to welcome him, escorting him back to Jade Capital. At that moment, the Heavenly Master, having received this wondrous Dharma, declared: "I vow to propagate it widely, transmitting it to the virtuous. If men or women receive, uphold, and recite it, I, along with the Ten Precept Celestial Officials, shall protect them wherever they may be." Thereupon, he bowed to the Venerable Lord and offered this eulogy:

Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
One’s destiny invokes true numen.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The household attains peace and tranquility.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Parents are preserved in long life.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All malevolent forces turn to dust.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Myriad evils naturally return to rectitude.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All undertakings prosper as desired.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The entire family enjoys health and well-being.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Descendants are safeguarded in glory and flourishing.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
The five paths open of their own accord.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
All misfortunes are forever extinguished.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Livestock thrives and multiplies.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Illnesses find healing and recovery.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Wealth and possessions are not squandered in vain.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
Unforeseen troubles never arise.
Where the *Northern Dipper Scripture* dwells,
One eternally preserves harmony, benefit, and integrity.

The Venerable Lord said: "Excellent! Excellent!"

Thus, they will attain the perfection of sagely wisdom, their presence and absence unfathomable, moving freely between existence and non-existence, roaming the cloudy skies, ascending through the Golden Gate, and uniting with the Perfected. Their bodies will transcend the Three Realms, never again to be subject to the wheel of rebirth, their lifespan boundless, and their joy and freedom unending."

Shall universally reach all beings,

The Heavenly Master bowed his head in reverence and gratitude,
Faithfully receiving and upholding the teaching.

Thus concludes the *Most High Mysterious Numinous Northern Dipper Original Destiny Life-Prolonging True Scripture*.
